text: The centerfold of a magazine is a picture printed on a single sheet of paper and inserted in the middle of the publication. Centerfold may also refer to: *"Centerfold" (song), a 1981 song by The J. Geils Band *"Centerfold", a song from the 2006 album I'm Not Dead by Pink *"Centerfold", a song from the 2002 album Party Warriors by Captain Jack *"Centrefolds", a song from the 2003 album Sleeping with Ghosts by Placebo *Centerfold, a popular Dutch girl band featuring Laura Fygi
title: Centerfold (disambiguation)
